members.name: Rinkou Ashelia
members.lore: A 'clumsy' special agent from the other world. Cheerful, clueless, and laid back - a little too laid back to be on the run...

members.name: Pipkin Pippa
members.nameJP: ピップキン ピッパ
members.lore: The cutest rabbit in the universe - or so she would like you to thin-'PIPIPIPIPI'

members.name: Tenma Maemi
members.lore: A mysterious little fox claiming to be a college student. She appears to be smart, kind and innocent, but harbors an unexplained fixation on a particular rabbit.

members.name: Fujikura Uruka
members.lore: A trainee agent from the other world. She dropped out of the academy to pursue her dream of becoming a rock-star. Well... Let's just say it's not going too well for her...

members.name: Hakushika Iori
members.lore: A special killer-agent disguised as a maid. She was sent from the other world to capture a very dangerous criminal and retrieve a very important relic. The fate of the other world depends on it!

members.name: Shisui Michiru
members.lore: The daughter of a powerful wizard and a beastman. She grew up surrounded by magic, animals, and love. As a free spirited young wizard, she decides to travel the worlds and experience new things.

members.name: Utatane Nasa
members.lore: A 'young dragon' who has just recently awakened from her slumber. What awaits her in this new world?
